categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Kima Nazith was a Human female that lived during the Galactic Civil War. She was an active member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic and worked as a bodyguard for Pooja Naberrie. She once hired a spacer to kill Hrodius Goragg, a Trandoshan bounty hunter working for the Galactic Empire.
